mapper.select: SELECT categoryNum, categoryName, sortOrder FROM category WHERE parentCategory IS NULL AND species = #{species} ORDER BY sortOrder
SELECT categoryNum, categoryName, parentCategory, sortOrder, species FROM category WHERE parentCategory = #{parentCategory} ORDER BY sortOrder

SELECT a.attributeNum, attributeName, categoryNum, attrDtlNum, attrDtlName FROM attribute a JOIN attributeDetail d ON a.attributeNum = d.attributeNum WHERE categoryNum = #{categoryNum} ORDER BY attributeNum, attrDtlNum
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (productNum, productName, productClass, species, price, discountRate, deliveryCharge, productDesc, thumbnail, productStatus, regDate, modifyDate, origin, brand, manufacturer, categoryNum) VALUES (product_seq.NEXTVAL, #{productName}, #{productClass}, #{species}, #{price}, #{discountRate}, #{deliveryCharge}, #{productDesc}, #{thumbnail}, #{productStatus}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{origin}, #{brand}, #{manufacturer}, #{categoryNum})
INSERT INTO productImage (imageNum, productNum, imageName) VALUES (productImage_seq.NEXTVAL, #{productNum}, #{imageName})
